document.forum_title: Latest Press Releases News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Fitch Rates Glendale, CA's Elec Rev Bonds 'A+'; Outlook Stable
document.topic_text: Fitch Rates Glendale, CA's Elec Rev Bonds 'A+'; Outlook Stable Monday, 25 April 2016 ( 13 minutes ago ) AUSTIN, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Fitch Ratings has assigned a 'A+' rating to the following electric system revenue bonds issued by the City of Glendale, CA on behalf of Glendale Water & Power (GWP): --$75.5 million electric revenue bonds, refunding series 2016. Proceeds of the series 2016 bonds will refund outstanding series 2006 and 2008 bonds for savings and pay costs of issuance. The 2016 bonds are expected to price on May 4, 2016 via competitive sale. In addition, Fitch has affirmed the
